data.name: Warehouse and Logistics Simulator
data.detailed_description:
Are you ready for your new challenge? Get ready to take over the control of your original "Jungheinrich" Forklift! Just the best drivers will level up in the Highscore list. The fastest drivers will receive a special bonus.

Enjoy the game in full 3D and feel the realistic driving experience. Varied scenarios like the warehouse, construction zone or port zone guarantee variety.

Features

  • Original "Jungheinrich" Forklifts
  • Huge variety of quests
  • Different game modes
  • Realistic physics
  • Different detailed 3D Scenarios like supermarket, port or construction zone

data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8
  • Processor: Pentium 2,4 GHz Pentium or equal AMD
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 6800GT / ATI Radeon HD3650
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Pentium 3,0 GHz Pentium or equal AMD
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX560 / ATI Radeon HD6970
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
